text: Paul De Backer (7 February 1883 - 2 October 1956) was a Belgian swimmer. He competed in the men's 1500 metre freestyle event at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1883 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Belgian male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Belgium Category:Swimmers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Paul De Backer
